title: Fragment, late 18th century
medium:
Medium: silk
Technique: supplementary warp pile (velvet), cut and uncut
creditline: Bequest of Richard Cranch Greenleaf in memory of his mother, Adeline Emma Greenleaf
description: Panel of black velvet, cut and uncut, on black satin ground. Deep border with architectural details and men with crossed swords, perpendicular stripes and minute flowers.

tombstone.epitaph:
Fragment, late 18th century. Medium: silk
Technique: supplementary warp pile (velvet), cut and uncut. Bequest of Richard Cranch Greenleaf in memory of his mother, Adeline Emma Greenleaf. 1962-56-53.
